Method Detail

checkAndCreateDirectory

public static boolean checkAndCreateDirectory(java.lang.String path)
It checks if the location represented by the path provided is a directory. the directory structure represented by the path parameter is created if it does not already exist.

Parameters:
path - the location of the directory
Returns:
true or false . false if the location specified by the path param existed but was not a directory, true otherwise. Also would return false if it tried to create the directory stucture represented by the path param if it did not already exist, and failed in doing that.

clearFolder

public static boolean clearFolder(java.io.File folder)
deletes all the files and folders recursively at the specified directory location, EXCLUDing the directory location itself.

Parameters:
folder - File handler for the directory location, all of its contents of which have to be cleared
Returns:
boolean true or false depending upon whether the operation succeeded or not.

deleteTarget

public static boolean deleteTarget(java.io.File handler)
deletes all the files and folders recursively at the specified directory location, including the directory location.

Parameters:
handler - File handler for the target, which has to be deleted along with all of its contents
Returns:
boolean true or false depending upon whether the operation succeeded or not.

getTEMP_DIR_PATH

public static java.lang.String getTEMP_DIR_PATH()
gets the path of the current temp directory to be used by the application. All temporary files should be created in the directory represented by the path returned by this function.

Returns:
String the temporary working directory path.

listFilesForFolder

public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> listFilesForFolder(java.io.File folder)
gets a set of the absolute paths of all the files (recursively) at the specified location

Parameters:
folder - File handler for the directory for which all the path of all the files are needed
Returns:
Set

setTEMP_DIR_PATH

public static boolean setTEMP_DIR_PATH(java.lang.String path)
updates (and creates the directory structure if needed) the location of the temporary directory to be used by the application.

Parameters:
path - the path of the temp directory.
Returns:
boolean true or false whether it could update the location of the temp directory.

copyDirectoryContents

public static void copyDirectoryContents(java.io.File srcDir,
                                         java.io.File destDir)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
copies all the contents (files and directories recursively) of the srcDir to destDir. The destDir is created if it does not exist. example: srcDir/x and destDir. copyDirectoryContents(srcDir, destDir) would result in: srcDir/x --> destDir/x

Parameters:
srcDir -
destDir -
Throws:
java.io.IOException
See Also:
.copyDirectory(File, File), .copyFile(File, File)

public static boolean validURL(java.lang.String spec)
returns true if spec is a valid URL, false otherwise.

Parameters:
spec -
Returns:
true or false
